name: Blenderolli
description:
a game where you play as a square... WITH GUNS

Play with your friends using Blenderolli's Game ID Multiplayer system (It's just like Among Us!)

And of course we added some extreme Lighting to the game, so it looks great

and the best part.. ITS FREE, unless you want to donate of course

Enjoy and Good Luck!

named after a Blender and a Stroller... bruh
